img_above_text:
For all their extra health, they don't have too many more moves than a regular enemy, so keep on the offensive so they don't have a chance to sprout more spore projectiles, using Immobilize to lock them down and Rock Solid when they try to swipe at you with their staff.
Once defeated, you'll gain a Knot of Voidness, and a Monkey-Head Fungus Seed to take back to the Zodiac Village, as well as their Fungiwoman Spirit to absorb.
img_below_text: Be sure to check the shack on the far end before leaving, as you'll find the **Sunset of the Nine Skies Drink** sittng on a table, which will restore Qi as well as health!

Once defeated, you'll gain a Knot of Voidness, and a Monkey-Head Fungus Seed to take back to the Zodiac Village, as well as their Fungiwoman Spirit to absorb."

img_summary: The image depicts a player character crouching near a shack in a lush, rocky environment, wielding a fiery weapon. A glowing item, highlighted with a red circle, is visible on a table near the shack, likely the **Sunset of the Nine Skies Drink** mentioned in the following text. The HUD shows the player's health, abilities, and "Will" resource, indicating gameplay readiness. This scene emphasizes exploration and item collection after defeating a challenging enemy.
